entities.name: faithful
entities.description: A song sung by an empty helmet.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker who had to extract Peeves from inside the armor.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A ghost who took refuge in the armor and filled in the gaps of the song with his own lyrics.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters who hadn't asked Cho to the ball.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who was getting nervous about not having a partner for the dance.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A person Harry hadn't asked to the ball.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: The ghost who haunted the girls' toilets on the second floor.

relationships.description: Filch had to extract Peeves from inside the armor.
Harry hadn't asked Cho to the ball.
Harry considered Moaning Myrtle as a potential partner for the dance.
